text: The Junior Eurovision Song Contest 2015 was the thirteenth edition of the Junior Eurovision Song Contest. It took place at the Arena Armeec, Sofia, Bulgaria on 21 November 2015, Bulgarian broadcaster Bulgarian National Television was the host broadcaster for the event. The motto for the contest was "#Discover". ==Results== Draw Country Artist Song Language Place Points 01 Lena Stamenković "Lenina pesma" Serbian 7 79 02 The Virus "Gabede" Georgian 10 51 03 Lina Kuduzović "Prva ljubezen" Slovene, English 3 112 04 Chiara & Martina "Viva" Italian 16 34 05 Shalisa "Million Lights" Dutch, English 15 35 06 Bella Paige "My Girls" English 8 64 07 Aimee Banks "Réalta na Mara" Irish 12 36 08 Mikhail Smirnov "Mechta (Dream)" Russian, English 6 80 09 Ivana Petkovska & Magdalena Aleksovska "Pletenka – Braid of Love" Macedonian 17 26 10 Ruslan Aslanov "Volshebstvo (Magic)" Russian, English 4 105 11 Mika "Love" Armenian, English 2 176 12 Anna Trincher "Pochny z sebe - Contestant Voting nation 8 Malta Albania, Armenia, Australia, Bulgaria, Kids' jury, San Marino, Serbia, Slovenia 4 Armenia Belarus, Georgia, Russia, Netherlands 2 Serbia Macedonia, Montenegro 1 Albania Italy Bulgaria Ireland Italy Malta San Marino Ukraine * All countries were given 12 points at the start of voting. This was so no country got nul points. ===Commentators=== Most countries sent commentators to Bulgaria, while others commentated from their own country ====Countries that took part in the content ==== * – Andri Xhahu (TVSH, RTSH Muzikë and Radio Tirana) * – Avet Barseghyan (Armenia 1) * – Ash London and Toby Truslove (SBS One) * – Anatoly Lipetski (Belarus 1 and Belarus 24) * – Elena Rosberg and Georgi Kushvaliev (BNT 1, BNT HD, BNT World) * – Tuta Chkheidze (GPB 1TV) * – Stiofán Ó Fearail and Caitlín Nic Aoidh (TG4) * – Simone Lijoi (Rai Gulp) * – Tina Tautovic and Spasija Veljanoska (MRT 1) * – Corazon Mizzi (TVM2 (live) and TVM (delayed)) * – Dražen Bauković and Tamara Ivanković (TVCG 2) * – Jan Smit (NPO 3) * – Olga Shelest (Karousel) * – Lia Fiorio and Gilberto Gattei (SMRTV) * – Silvana Grujić (RTS2) * – Andrej Hofer (TV SLO 1) * – Timur Miroshnychenko (UA:Pershyi) ====Countries that didn't take part in the content==== * — Thomas Mohr (NDR website) * – Ewan Spence (World FM) * – Ewan Spence (247 Music Radio) * – Ewan Spence (Cotswold FM, Fun Kids, Oystermouth Radio, Radio Six International and Shore Radio) * – Ewan Spence (WUSB) ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2015 in Europe Category:2015 in music Category:Bulgarian culture Category:Junior Eurovision Song Contest by year
